meanings.definition: A person who collects and sells junk or discarded items.
meanings.sent1: The junkmen drove around the neighborhood in their truck, looking for old furniture to sell.
meanings.sent2: The junkmen had a yard sale to get rid of all the items they had collected over the years.
meanings.sent3: The junkmen found a broken chair and turned it into a unique piece of art to sell.
meanings.sent4: The junkmen's eyes lit up when they stumbled upon a pile of discarded treasures.
meanings.sent5: The junkmen's business thrived as they turned trash into treasure for their customers.
